name: CanYouSurvive?
description:
CanYouSurvive? is a game about traveling through 4 different dimensions,fighting against a deadly virus.
This game is a classic runner, where you have to dodge obstacles
collect coins and climb the leaderboards, beating your own previous score and discovered the dimensions,if you can.
Main Character Unique Ability is triggered when his speed is increasing and allows him to enter through obstacles and teleport to another dimension.



Why choose CanYouSurvive? ?
-Competitive
-Fun
-Fast-paced and simple core gameplay
-Mysterious


Why not to choose CanYouSurvive? ?
-Don't want a challenge
-A Simple Game
-A little bit frustrated

Controls:
A-Move Left
D-Move Right
Space-Jump
